content.description: Question refers to the graphÂ below.
content.question: Which of the following factors most directly contributed to the change between the two periods shown in the graph?

choices.label: A rise in secular reform inspired by the Second Great Awakening
A fear of too much popular influence in government
An expansion of political democracy for White men
A growing reluctance to locate political power in legislative assemblies

content.answer: An expansion of political democracy for White men

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
